content.raw:
Updated  the \`example.ign\` launch file.

‌

I had to increase the z-parameter in the `spawner.rb` file because the vehicle spawns and falls through where the floor would be before the environment spawns.  Definitely something to look into.  It fell through at 5m and lower so I raised to 10 to temporarily fix the issue.  This is not an issue in `example.ign`.  Launch command for observed behavior `ign launch -v 4 urban_circuit.ign worldName:=urban_circuit_practice_02 robotName1:=alpha robotName1:=alpha robotConfig1:=x3_sensor_config_5 localModel:=true` \(when z offset in `spawner.rb` is set to <=5m\).
content.html:
Updated the `example.ign` launch file.

‌

I had to increase the z-parameter in the spawner.rb file because the vehicle spawns and falls through where the floor would be before the environment spawns. Definitely something to look into. It fell through at 5m and lower so I raised to 10 to temporarily fix the issue. This is not an issue in example.ign. Launch command for observed behavior ign launch -v 4 urban_circuit.ign worldName:=urban_circuit_practice_02 robotName1:=alpha robotName1:=alpha robotConfig1:=x3_sensor_config_5 localModel:=true (when z offset in spawner.rb is set to <=5m).
